infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We use your camera so you can capture store images, product photos, and documents needed to set up and manage your seller account.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We use your photo library so you can upload store images, product photos, and documents needed to set up and manage your seller account.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We use your location to automatically fill your store address and save accurate latitude and longitude. This helps us show your store to nearby users.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We use your location to automatically fill your store address and save accurate latitude and longitude. This helps us show your store to nearby users.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We use your location to automatically fill your store address and save accurate latitude and longitude. This helps us show your store to nearby users.
